description: Softronic AB engages in the provision of information technology and management consultancy services. The company is headquartered in Stockholm, Stockholm and currently employs 427 full-time employees.  The firm provides IT-based solutions designed to improve their customer’s business strategy and operations in a range of areas, such as sales, administration, research and development, production, distribution, e-commerce, customer services, and business intelligence. Its product portfolio includes: Softronic Insurance Technology Management (ITM), an insurance software; Appia Air Sales, a sales and reservation system for airlines; Appia Connect, a booking engine for travel agencies; Compliance Manager 1 (CM1), a Software as a Service (SaaS) against money laundering for financial institutions; as well as Vklass, a teaching and communication platform for schools; among others. Furthermore, the Company is a parent of a number of entities, such as Softronic Drift AB, Softronic TBook AB, Softronic Baltic AS and Softronic 1 AB.
naics: Computer Systems Design and Related Services
name: Softronic AB
